variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Randomly-generated 6-digit ID code preceded by CHOP ID code (95)
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: 16=Marshfield Clinic; 27=Vanderbilt University; 38=Group Health Cooperative; 49=Mayo Clinic; 52=Northwestern University; 63=Geisinger; 74=Mt. Sinai; 95=CHOP 6-digit random integer appended to the 2-digit site identifier.

variable.name: ORIGIN_ID
variable.description: ID of eMERGE Consortium Site

variable.name: Year_of_Birth
variable.description: Year of birth

variable.name: Sex_Genotype
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by genotype

variable.name: Sex_Med
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by medical records

variable.name: Sex_Survey
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by survey of patient/patient's parent

variable.name: Race_Med
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant as identified by medical records
variable.comment: AA=Black or African American; AI=American Indian or Alaska Native; AS=Asian; EA=European American; HI=Hispanic/Latino; PI=Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander; OT=Other; NA=Not Available/Missing Dataset enriched for European and African American samples.

variable.name: Race_Survey
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant as identified by patient/patient's parent
variable.comment: AA=Black or African American; AI=American Indian or Alaska Native; AS=Asian; EA=European American; HI=Hispanic/Latino; PI=Native Hawaiian/Pacific islander; OT=Other; NA=Not Available/Missing Dataset enriched for European and African American samples.
variable.value: Black or African American; American Indian or Alaska Native
Black or African American; Hispanic/Latino; European American
American Indian or Alaska Native; European American
European American; Black or African American
European American; Black or African American; Hispanic/Latino
European American; Hispanic/Latino; Black or African American

variable.name: Affection_Status
variable.description: Indicates whether participant is a case or control

variable.name: Chip_Type
variable.description: Array on which participants were genotyped
variable.comment: QUAD=Illumina Human610-Quadv1 V1=Illumina HumanHap550v1 V2=Illumina HumanHap550v2 V3=Illumina HumanHap550v3

variable.name: Secondary_Diagnoses
variable.description: Secondary diagnoses as defined by ICD9 code(s)
variable.comment: The list of ICD9 codes/definitions is too large to include in the data dictionary and can be reviewed at: icd9

variable.description: Codes for procedures/tests performed on ADHD patients
